lead_paragraph: The Denver Nuggets’ Carmelo Anthony was sentenced to a year probation, 24 hours of community service and more than $1,000 in fees and court costs after prosecutors dropped a D.U.I. charge to a reduced charge of driving while ability-impaired.
snippet: The Denver Nuggets’ Carmelo Anthony was sentenced to a year probation, 24 hours of community service and more than $1,000 in fees and court costs after prosecutors dropped a D.U.I. charge to a reduced charge of driving while ability-impaired.
